title: Merge Duplicate Patient Charts
description: A Health Information Management (HIM) specialist has identified two charts for the same patient that need to be merged.

tasks.description: Identify the two potential duplicate patient records and review the demographic information on both.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that the two records belong to the same patient.

tasks.description: Select the primary (surviving) record and the secondary (to be merged) record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly designates which record will be kept as the master.

tasks.description: Initiate the chart merge process, which combines all clinical and financial data into the primary record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully merges the two charts, and the secondary record is inactivated.
